Literature.Title: A polyalanine peptide derived from polar fish with anti-infectious activities
Literature.Author: Nolasco DO, de la Fuente-Núnez C, Felício MR, Gonçalves S, Matos CO, Liao LM, Santos NC, Hancock RE, Franco OL, Migliolo L, Cardoso MH,  Ribeiro SM
